title: Baba Yaga : A Russian Folktale
description: A disarmingly direct and authentic introduction to the well-known witch. . . . Arnold emulates traditional Russion 'lubok' art . . . in a vivid, energetic style that's a beautiful complement to the lively story. Sure to draw readers with its jewel-bright colors and pleasingly gruesome witch.--Kirkus. Full color.
author: Katya Arnold
